title: Gris
description: 'Gris' is a low-tech greywater-system for Third World Countries which can collect all the water you use during a shower. You can use this collected grey water for flushing the toilet, cleaning the house and for certain washing activities. This way you can save at least 80 liter water/person/day in an average household which means at least 1.5 billion liter saved water per day in such an 50 million habitant country like Colombia.
